languages.text: "Ваша Светлость! Простите за столь безобразную сцену, но не могли бы вы усмирить госпожу Хейдари и прервать ее... провокационные действия в мой адрес".

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость! Простите за столь безобразную сцену, но не могли бы вы усмирить госпожу Хейдари и прервать ее... провокационные действия в мой адрес".

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I apologise for this ugly scene, but might I ask that you rein in Mistress Heydari and put a stop to her... inflammatory actions toward me?"
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость! Простите за столь безобразную сцену, но не могли бы вы усмирить госпожу Хейдари и прервать ее... провокационные действия в мой адрес".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I apologise for this ugly scene, but might I ask that you rein in Mistress Heydari and put a stop to her... instigative actions toward me?"
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I apologise for this ugly scene, but might I ask that you rein in Mistress Heydari and put a stop to her... instigative actions toward me?"
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I apologise for this ugly scene, but might I ask that you rein in Mistress Heydari and put a stop to her... instigative actions toward me?"
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I apologise for this ugly scene, but might I ask that you rein in Mistress Heydari and put a stop to her... instigative actions toward me?"
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I apologise for this ugly scene, but might I ask that you rein in Mistress Heydari and put a stop to her... inflammatory actions toward me?"
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I apologise for this ugly scene, but might I ask that you rein in Mistress Heydari and put a stop to her... inflammatory actions toward me?"

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie ! Je m'excuse que vous ayez dû assister à cela, mais pourriez-vous réfréner maîtresse Heydari et lui demander de cesser ses... actes insensés à mon endroit ? »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I apologise for this ugly scene, but might I ask that you rein in Mistress Heydari and put a stop to her... inflammatory actions toward me?"

traits.locale_text: « Pitié, je m'excuse que vous ayez dû assister à cela, mais pourriez-vous réfréner maîtresse Heydari et lui demander de cesser ses... investigations à mon endroit ? »

languages.text: “大人！我为这不体面的一幕道歉，但能否请您管住海达利女士，制止她……对我的挑衅行为？”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I apologise for this ugly scene, but might I ask that you rein in Mistress Heydari and put a stop to her... inflammatory actions toward me?"

traits.locale_text: “大人！我为这不体面的一幕道歉，但能否请您管住海达利女士，制止她……对我的挑衅行为？”

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Verzeiht diese hässliche Szene, aber darf ich darum bitten, dass Ihr Herrin Heydari bremst und ihre ... Hetzereien gegen mich unterbindet?"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I apologise for this ugly scene, but might I ask that you rein in Mistress Heydari and put a stop to her... inflammatory actions toward me?"

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Verzeiht diese hässliche Szene, aber darf ich darum bitten, dass Ihr Herrin Heydari bremst und ihre ... Hetzereien gegen mich unterbindet?"

languages.text: «¡{mf|Milord|Milady}! Le pido perdón por esta escena tan desagradable, pero ¿podría pedirle que refrene a la señora Heydari y ponga fin a sus... actos hacia mi persona?».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I apologise for this ugly scene, but might I ask that you rein in Mistress Heydari and put a stop to her... inflammatory actions toward me?"

traits.locale_text: «¡{mf|Milord|Milady}! Le pido perdón por esta escena tan desagradable, pero ¿podría pedirle que refrene a la señora Heydari y ponga fin a su... instigación hacia mi persona?».

languages.text: 「陛下！この醜態をお詫び申し上げますが、ヘイダリ女史を制止し、私に対する扇動的な行動を止めていただけないでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I apologise for this ugly scene, but might I ask that you rein in Mistress Heydari and put a stop to her... inflammatory actions toward me?"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下！この醜態をお詫び申し上げますが、ヘイダリ女史を制止し、私に対する扇動的な行動を止めていただけないでしょうか？」

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Bu nahoş manzara için özür dilerim. Acaba Üstat Heydari'yi dizginleyip bana karşı kışkırtıcı hareketlerine son vermenizi rica edebilir miyim?"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I apologise for this ugly scene, but might I ask that you rein in Mistress Heydari and put a stop to her... inflammatory actions toward me?"

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Bu nahoş manzara için özür dilerim ama acaba Üstat Heydari'yi dizginleyip bana karşı kışkırtıcı hareketlerine son vermenizi isteyebilir miyim?"
